attributes.description: This Supply Chain is the process of the collecting Raw materials and sending them "down the line" to production and distribution of the finished product to the consumer and then the Consumer would consume it. The amount of flying and driving and sailing had to do to make this pen is catastrophic and I think it would reduce the harmful gases if there was one place that it was made/sold and that would help for not only us but the entire Earth too.
attributes.title: From Plastic to Pen
Aluminum
attributes.description: The greatest Producer for Aluminum is Germany

attributes.title: Manufacturing Plant for the raw materials
attributes.description: This manufacturing plant collects all of the raw materials for the production.

attributes.title: Stainless Steel
attributes.description: The stainless steel also comes from the plant.

attributes.title: Bauxite
attributes.description: This little Island is where the most production of bauxite is from.

attributes.title: Plastic
attributes.description: Russia besides China is the largest exporter/producer of plastic

attributes.title: Final Assembly
attributes.description: This plant not only produces copper but it is where the pen is put together.

attributes.title: Consumer (Me)
attributes.description: Even though I prefer a pencil I still love those god old pens.

attributes.description: The Manufacturing Plant is just before the assembly of all the parts.
